metadata.name: Moment Of Love
metadata.description:
This artwork is about Grandpa. I made a painting of my grandmother. Because we had a small passport size photo of her and he could not see her picture clearly.

 Showed love toward his heavenly wife. grandpa kept looking at her picture peacefully for almost 1 hour and I was happy to see a slight smile on his face.

Grandpa asked me "Has your grandma WhatsApped you her selfie from heaven".

Resolution - 3240 Ã— 4320 pxl
